page.title: 02The Longnor Area
page.content:
I live near the area which we are studying - it is just up the road. I am dealing with Longnor Wood and the area around it.
I visited a house called Wood Cottage which is at the edge of the wood and was built in 1853. It used to be called Millmoorhead Cottage.
Longnor Wood is owned by the Harpur Crewe Estate and the trees are all conifers.
The ground in my area is mostly pasture or wood. There are only 3 houses in this area. It is not a flat area and is mostly hilly. A road passes through the area which links Longnor and Leek.
